title: What's cocacola's exact font? (not the logo, the copy treatment)
content:
Can't figure this out. Some type of Arial?

comments.content: No wait, I had the right answer in here, but since you've posted in the wrong forum I've removed it. This forum is for getting critique for your own font projects – please repost in the Font ID section.
